mapper.insert: insert into File(userId, security, security2, securityName, securityDetail) values(#{userId}, #{security}, #{security2}, #{securityName}, #{securityDetail})
mapper.select: select fileId, userId, security, securityName, uploadDate, updateDate from File where 1=1 and userId = #{userId}
select fileId, userId, security, securityName, uploadDate, updateDate from File where 1=1 and fileId = #{fileId}
